ImportJob.description: An ImportJob allow defining a repository artifact to poll for discovering Services and APIs mocks and tests

active.description: Whether this ImportJob is active (ie. scheduled for execution)

etag.description: Etag of repository URL during previous import. Is used for not re-importing if no recent changes

lastImportError.description: Error message of last import (if any)

mainArtifact.description: Flag telling if considered as primary or secondary artifact. Default to `true`

name.description: Unique distinct name of this ImportJob

repositoryDisableSSLValidation.description: Whether to disable SSL certificate verification when checking repository

repositoryUrl.description: URL of mocks and tests repository artifact

serviceRefs.description: References of Services discovered when checking repository

Metadata.description: Commodity object for holding metadata on any entity. This object is inspired by Kubernetes metadata.

SecretRef.description: Lightweight reference for an existing Secret

name.description: Distinct name of the referenced Secret

ServiceRef.description: Lightweight reference of an existing Service
